title: No, Nirmala Sitharaman Did Not Touch Abhinandan’s Mother’s Feet
subtitle: The woman whose feet thedefence minister touches is Hema Kumari, mother of a martyr named Ajit Pradhan.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: A short video recently went viral on social media which shows the defence minister touching the feet of a lady. The caption along with the video read, “Nirmala Sitaraman our honourable defence minister touching the feet of Abhinandan's mother. These are the values that need to be inculcated in our children. It comes by setting an example not asking then to do [sic].”
